name: Rejecting an attempt to add a book without required information
description:
To protect data consistency and the user experience,
  the system should clearly communicate errors and block invalid operations.
descriptionHtml:
To protect data consistency and the user experience,
the system should clearly communicate errors and block invalid operations.
statusMessage: Expected one of [BAD_REQUEST (400), UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY (422)], but was OK (200)
statusTrace:

	at ✽.the addition of a book is rejected with a clear message indicating which data must be provided(classpath:eu/delimata/bookstore/books-negative.feature:23)

steps.name: Given I have valid permissions to manage the bookstore
When I try to add a new book with missing data title
Then the addition of a book is rejected with a clear message indicating which data must be provided
steps.statusMessage: Expected one of [BAD_REQUEST (400), UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY (422)], but was OK (200)
